org.gillius.jalleg.framework.io

Class AllegroLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gillius.jalleg.framework.io.AllegroLoader

  • public class AllegroLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods to load Allegro resources such as images from Java byte arrays, InputStreams, or classpath resources.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      static java.lang.String getIdentFromPath(java.lang.String path)
      Pulls an Allegro "ident" file extension such as ".png" by looking at the end of the given path.
      static org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_BITMAP loadBitmap(java.io.InputStream is, java.lang.String ident)
      Uses AllegroLibrary.al_load_bitmap_f(org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_FILE, java.lang.String) to load bitmap data.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentFromPath

        public static java.lang.String getIdentFromPath(java.lang.String path)
        Pulls an Allegro "ident" file extension such as ".png" by looking at the end of the given path.

      • loadBitmapFromClasspath

        public static org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_BITMAP loadBitmapFromClasspath(java.lang.String path)
                                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Uses AllegroLibrary.al_load_bitmap_f(org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_FILE, java.lang.String) to load bitmap data. File type will be autodetected from the path's extension if possible (via getIdentFromPath(String)), or from AllegroLibrary.al_identify_bitmap_f(org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_FILE).
        Parameters:
        path - classpath available from the root (boot) classpath
        Throws:
        AllegroException - if al_load_bitmap_flags_f fails
        java.io.IOException

      • loadBitmapFromClasspath

        public static org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_BITMAP loadBitmapFromClasspath(java.lang.String path,
                                                                                               java.lang.String ident,
                                                                                               int flags)
                                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Uses AllegroLibrary.al_load_bitmap_f(org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_FILE, java.lang.String) to load bitmap data.
        Parameters:
        path - classpath available from the root (boot) classpath
        ident - type of file such as ".png" or null to use getIdentFromPath(String). If the path does not end with a file extension, then auto-detect with AllegroLibrary.al_identify_bitmap_f(org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_FILE)
        flags - flags to pass such as AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_NO_PREMULTIPLIED_ALPHA
        Throws:
        AllegroException - if al_load_bitmap_flags_f fails
        java.io.IOException

      • loadBitmap

        public static org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_BITMAP loadBitmap(java.io.InputStream is,
                                                                                  java.lang.String ident)
                                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Uses AllegroLibrary.al_load_bitmap_f(org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_FILE, java.lang.String) to load bitmap data.
        Parameters:
        is - image data; stream is closed by this function
        ident - type of file such as ".png" or null to auto-detect with AllegroLibrary.al_identify_bitmap_f(org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_FILE)
        Throws:
        AllegroException - if al_load_bitmap_flags_f fails
        java.io.IOException

      • loadBitmap

        public static org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_BITMAP loadBitmap(java.io.InputStream is,
                                                                                  java.lang.String ident,
                                                                                  int flags)
                                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Uses AllegroLibrary.al_load_bitmap_f(org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_FILE, java.lang.String) to load bitmap data.
        Parameters:
        is - image data; stream is closed by this function
        ident - type of file such as ".png" or null to auto-detect with AllegroLibrary.al_identify_bitmap_f(org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_FILE)
        flags - flags to pass such as AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_NO_PREMULTIPLIED_ALPHA
        Throws:
        AllegroException - if al_load_bitmap_flags_f fails
        java.io.IOException

      • loadConfigFromClasspath

        public static org.gillius.jalleg.binding.AllegroLibrary.ALLEGRO_CONFIG loadConfigFromClasspath(java.lang.String path)
                                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                                                                           throws java.io.IOException

        java.io.IOException
